mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.title,a.sellPoint,a.price,a.image,b.name categoryName,c.itemDesc FROM tbitem a LEFT JOIN tbitemcat b ON a.cid=b.id LEFT JOIN tbitemdesc c ON a.id=c.itemId WHERE a.status=1

SELECT a.id,a.title,a.sellPoint,a.price,a.image,b.name categoryName,c.itemDesc FROM tbitem a LEFT JOIN tbitemcat b ON a.cid=b.id LEFT JOIN tbitemdesc c ON a.id=c.itemId WHERE a.updated < #{date} limit 1
